cobblemon.species.gardevoir.desc: It will dedicate itself to defending a master it has come to adore. Its pure white dress, reminiscent of those worn by ladies of nobility, is the dress of one who is willing to risk their life.
cobblemon.species.surskit.name: Сорскіт
cobblemon.species.surskit.desc: It lives in ponds and marshes that feature lots of plant life. It often fights with Dewpider, whose habitat and diet are similar.
cobblemon.species.masquerain.name: Масквірейн
cobblemon.species.masquerain.desc: Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent. It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.
cobblemon.species.shroomish.name: Шруміш
cobblemon.species.shroomish.desc: If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores are so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.
cobblemon.species.breloom.name: Брілум
cobblemon.species.breloom.desc: The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
cobblemon.species.slakoth.name: Слакот
cobblemon.species.slakoth.desc: Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokémon in motion.
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.name: Віґорот
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.desc: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.
cobblemon.species.slaking.name: Слакінґ
cobblemon.species.slaking.desc: Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
cobblemon.species.nincada.name: Нінкада
cobblemon.species.nincada.desc: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
cobblemon.species.ninjask.name: Нін'яск
cobblemon.species.ninjask.desc: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
cobblemon.species.shedinja.name: Шедін'я
cobblemon.species.shedinja.desc: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
cobblemon.species.whismur.name: Вісмур
cobblemon.species.whismur.desc: When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder. It cries until it’s exhausted, then it falls asleep.
cobblemon.species.loudred.name: Лоудред
cobblemon.species.loudred.desc: The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that blows opponents away and damages them.
cobblemon.species.exploud.name: Експлоуд
cobblemon.species.exploud.desc: This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.
cobblemon.species.makuhita.name: Макухіта
cobblemon.species.makuhita.desc: There’s a rumor of a traditional recipe for stew that Trainers can use to raise strong Makuhita.
cobblemon.species.hariyama.name: Гаріяма
cobblemon.species.hariyama.desc: Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily strong. There are some small ones that move nimbly and use moves skillfully.
cobblemon.species.azurill.name: Азуріл
cobblemon.species.azurill.desc: Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry one will swing around the big ball on its tail and try to smash its opponents.
cobblemon.species.nosepass.name: Ноуспас
cobblemon.species.nosepass.desc: Once the people of Hisui discovered that its red nose always points north, they grew to rely on it greatly when traveling afar. The nose seems to work in a similar way to ancient compasses.
cobblemon.species.skitty.name: Скітті
cobblemon.species.skitty.desc: Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail. In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests. It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.
cobblemon.species.delcatty.name: Делкетті
cobblemon.species.delcatty.desc: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
cobblemon.species.sableye.name: Саблай
cobblemon.species.sableye.desc: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
cobblemon.species.mawile.name: Мевайл
cobblemon.species.mawile.desc: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
cobblemon.species.aron.name: Арон
cobblemon.species.aron.desc: When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.
cobblemon.species.lairon.name: Лайрон
cobblemon.species.lairon.desc: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.
cobblemon.species.aggron.name: Агрон
cobblemon.species.aggron.desc: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.
cobblemon.species.meditite.name: Медітайт
cobblemon.species.meditite.desc: Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation. It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another aspect of this Pokémon’s training.
cobblemon.species.medicham.name: Медічам
cobblemon.species.medicham.desc: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.
cobblemon.species.electrike.name: Електрайк
cobblemon.species.electrike.desc: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
cobblemon.species.manectric.name: Манектрік
cobblemon.species.manectric.desc: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
cobblemon.species.plusle.name: Плюсл
cobblemon.species.plusle.desc: When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon cries loudly.
cobblemon.species.minun.name: Мінун
cobblemon.species.minun.desc: Minun loves to cheer on its partner in battle. It gives off sparks from its body while it is doing so. If its partner is in trouble, this Pokémon gives off increasing amounts of sparks.
cobblemon.species.volbeat.name: Волбіт
cobblemon.species.volbeat.desc: Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat, it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky. This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.
cobblemon.species.illumise.name: Ілюмайс
cobblemon.species.illumise.desc: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
cobblemon.species.roselia.name: Розелія
cobblemon.species.roselia.desc: Though beautiful, it has highly poisonous thorns. There is an old tradition in my homeland wherein one would send these thorns to an opponent to challenge them to a duel.
cobblemon.species.gulpin.name: Ґалпін
cobblemon.species.gulpin.desc: Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
cobblemon.species.swalot.name: Свелот
cobblemon.species.swalot.desc: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.
cobblemon.species.carvanha.name: Карванья
cobblemon.species.carvanha.desc: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.name: Шарпедо
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.desc: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attacked—no exceptions.
cobblemon.species.wailmer.name: Вейлмер
cobblemon.species.wailmer.desc: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.
cobblemon.species.wailord.name: Вейлорд
cobblemon.species.wailord.desc: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.
cobblemon.species.numel.name: Намел
cobblemon.species.numel.desc: Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens. In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its movements become sluggish.
cobblemon.species.camerupt.name: Кеймрапт
cobblemon.species.camerupt.desc: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
cobblemon.species.torkoal.name: Торкол
cobblemon.species.torkoal.desc: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
cobblemon.species.spoink.name: Споінк
cobblemon.species.spoink.desc: Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger pearl.
cobblemon.species.grumpig.name: Ґрампіґ
cobblemon.species.grumpig.desc: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
cobblemon.species.spinda.name: Спінда
cobblemon.species.spinda.desc: Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its stumbling movements, it evades opponents’ attacks brilliantly!
cobblemon.species.trapinch.name: Трепінч
cobblemon.species.trapinch.desc: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
cobblemon.species.vibrava.name: Вібрава
cobblemon.species.vibrava.desc: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
cobblemon.species.flygon.name: Флайґон
cobblemon.species.flygon.desc: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
cobblemon.species.cacnea.name: Какнія
cobblemon.species.cacnea.desc: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
cobblemon.species.cacturne.name: Кактурн
cobblemon.species.cacturne.desc: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
cobblemon.species.swablu.name: Сваблу
cobblemon.species.swablu.desc: Since Swablu looks like a cumulus cloud, foes can have a hard time finding it. Apparently its wings turned white over many generations.
cobblemon.species.altaria.name: Алтарія
cobblemon.species.altaria.desc: This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.
cobblemon.species.zangoose.name: Зангус
cobblemon.species.zangoose.desc: Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.
cobblemon.species.seviper.name: Севайпер
cobblemon.species.seviper.desc: Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.
cobblemon.species.lunatone.name: Лунатон
cobblemon.species.lunatone.desc: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
cobblemon.species.solrock.name: Солрок
cobblemon.species.solrock.desc: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
cobblemon.species.barboach.name: Барбоч
cobblemon.species.barboach.desc: Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility hides this Pokémon from predators, and the slime on its body makes grasping it difficult.
cobblemon.species.whiscash.name: Віскеш
cobblemon.species.whiscash.desc: Strikes its caudal fin against the swamp bed to shake the ground and startle its prey. It will then swallow the fleeing prey whole. People mistook this behavior as the cause of earthquakes.
cobblemon.species.corphish.name: Корфіш
cobblemon.species.corphish.desc: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.name: Кродаунт
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.desc: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
cobblemon.species.baltoy.name: Балтой
cobblemon.species.baltoy.desc: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
cobblemon.species.claydol.name: Клейдол
cobblemon.species.claydol.desc: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
cobblemon.species.lileep.name: Ліліп
cobblemon.species.lileep.desc: Lileep clings to rocks on the seabed. When prey comes close, this Pokémon entangles it with petallike tentacles.
cobblemon.species.cradily.name: Краділі
cobblemon.species.cradily.desc: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
cobblemon.species.anorith.name: Аноріт
cobblemon.species.anorith.desc: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.armaldo.name: Армальдо
cobblemon.species.armaldo.desc: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
cobblemon.species.feebas.name: Фібас
cobblemon.species.feebas.desc: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
cobblemon.species.milotic.name: Майлотік
cobblemon.species.milotic.desc: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
cobblemon.species.castform.name: Кастформ
cobblemon.species.castform.desc: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!
cobblemon.species.kecleon.name: Кеклеон
cobblemon.species.kecleon.desc: Its color changes for concealment and also when its mood or health changes. The darker the color, the healthier it is.
cobblemon.species.shuppet.name: Шаппет
cobblemon.species.shuppet.desc: There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”
cobblemon.species.banette.name: Бейнет
cobblemon.species.banette.desc: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.
cobblemon.species.duskull.name: Даскал
cobblemon.species.duskull.desc: I've heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once they've been told the story of how this Pokémon roams about before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.
cobblemon.species.dusclops.name: Дасклопс
cobblemon.species.dusclops.desc: There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the bandages, never to return. I've been too scared to verify.
cobblemon.species.tropius.name: Тропіус
cobblemon.species.tropius.desc: Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck. In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.
cobblemon.species.chimecho.name: Чаймехо
cobblemon.species.chimecho.desc: Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind within its body.
cobblemon.species.absol.name: Абсол
cobblemon.species.absol.desc: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.
cobblemon.species.wynaut.name: Вайнаут
cobblemon.species.wynaut.desc: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
cobblemon.species.snorunt.name: Снорант
cobblemon.species.snorunt.desc: Arrives alongside the first snow. It's thought that homes Snorunt visit will prosper for many generations. By tradition, one might offer a lump of ice made from pure water at one's front door.
cobblemon.species.glalie.name: Ґлейлі
cobblemon.species.glalie.desc: It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were frozen desserts.
cobblemon.species.spheal.name: Сфіл
cobblemon.species.spheal.desc: During the season when drift ice approaches the shore, Spheal prefers living on the ice—where fewer predators lurk—rather than the land. Its fur retains heat superbly and resists harsh cold.
cobblemon.species.sealeo.name: Сілео
cobblemon.species.sealeo.desc: Its white whiskers are very sensitive. Sealeo will balance Spheal on the tip of its nose, checking its scent and its feel to be sure the Spheal is healthy.
cobblemon.species.walrein.name: Валрейн
cobblemon.species.walrein.desc: Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year. The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.
cobblemon.species.clamperl.name: Кламперл
cobblemon.species.clamperl.desc: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
cobblemon.species.huntail.name: Гантейл
cobblemon.species.huntail.desc: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.name: Ґоребіс
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.desc: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.relicanth.name: Релікант
cobblemon.species.relicanth.desc: This Pokémon was discovered during deep-sea exploration. Its appearance hasn’t changed in 100,000,000 years, so it’s called a living fossil.
cobblemon.species.luvdisc.name: Лавдиск
cobblemon.species.luvdisc.desc: Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space between Corsola’s branches.
cobblemon.species.bagon.name: Беґон
cobblemon.species.bagon.desc: Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn’t form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.
cobblemon.species.shelgon.name: Шелґон
cobblemon.species.shelgon.desc: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.
cobblemon.species.salamence.name: Саламенс
cobblemon.species.salamence.desc: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.
cobblemon.species.beldum.name: Белдум
cobblemon.species.beldum.desc: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.
cobblemon.species.metang.name: Метанґ
cobblemon.species.metang.desc: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.
cobblemon.species.metagross.name: Метаґрос
cobblemon.species.metagross.desc: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.
cobblemon.species.regirock.name: Реджірок
cobblemon.species.regirock.desc: Cutting-edge technology was used to study the internals of this Pokémon’s rock body, but nothing was found—not even a brain or a heart.
cobblemon.species.regice.name: Реджийс
cobblemon.species.regice.desc: This Pokémon’s body is made of solid ice. It’s said that Regice was born beneath thick ice in the ice age.
cobblemon.species.registeel.name: Реджистіл
cobblemon.species.registeel.desc: It’s rumored that this Pokémon was born deep underground in the planet’s mantle and that it emerged onto the surface 10,000 years ago.
cobblemon.species.latias.name: Латіас
cobblemon.species.latias.desc: Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down. The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts light to alter its appearance.
cobblemon.species.latios.name: Латіос
cobblemon.species.latios.desc: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
cobblemon.species.kyogre.name: Кайогр
cobblemon.species.kyogre.desc: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
cobblemon.species.groudon.name: Ґраудон
cobblemon.species.groudon.desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
cobblemon.species.rayquaza.name: Рейкваза
cobblemon.species.rayquaza.desc: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.
cobblemon.species.jirachi.name: Джирачі
cobblemon.species.jirachi.desc: It’s believed that when this Pokémon wakes from its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes written on the notes attached to its head.
cobblemon.species.deoxys.name: Деоксис
cobblemon.species.deoxys.desc: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
cobblemon.species.turtwig.name: Тортвіґ
cobblemon.species.turtwig.desc: Тортвіґ стає більш енергійним, під яскравими променями сонячного світла. Частина, що нагадує мушлю, схожа на накип, злегка волога і тепла на дотик.
cobblemon.species.grotle.name: Ґротл
cobblemon.species.grotle.desc: Appears where there is clean spring water. The fruit that grows on the shrubs on its shell is sweet, nutritious, and truly delicious.
cobblemon.species.torterra.name: Тортерра
cobblemon.species.torterra.desc: This remarkable, large-bodied Pokémon would serve beautifully as borrowed scenery for a garden, and its strength is peerless. Torterra roams the wilderness in search of clean water.
cobblemon.species.chimchar.name: Чімчар
cobblemon.species.chimchar.desc: Бадьорий і завжди в піднесеному настрої. Колись він був відомий під назвою «Сяючий-Хвіст» та лякався його виду.
cobblemon.species.monferno.name: Монферно
cobblemon.species.monferno.desc: The deeper the blue on its face, the more powerful it will grow to become. It leaps about every which way and lands powerful blows against its opponents with the flame on its tail.
cobblemon.species.infernape.name: Інфернейп
cobblemon.species.infernape.desc: A tall, hardy Pokémon with a dazzling appearance. It shrouds itself in flame and battles as if engaged in dance—truly a sight to behold.
cobblemon.species.piplup.name: Піплап
cobblemon.species.piplup.desc: Віддає перевагу холоду та вбачається вздовж берегів моря. Це чарівне маленьке створіння наче миле дитинча, — але також горда, не бажає приймати подачки від людей.
cobblemon.species.prinplup.name: Прінплап
cobblemon.species.prinplup.desc: It swims gracefully through the frigid sea and sings with a voice like the roaring tide. It has powerful, sturdy wings and dignity to match.
cobblemon.species.empoleon.name: Емполеон
cobblemon.species.empoleon.desc: Since ancient times, it has been revered by the people of Hisui, who call it the Master of the Waves. Its wings are a match for even master-crafted blades.
cobblemon.species.starly.name: Старлі
cobblemon.species.starly.desc: They live in the fields and mountains, gathering in large flocks. Their cries are quite obnoxious. Though small, their wings are strong—a strike from them leaves pain that persists for a week.
cobblemon.species.staravia.name: Старавія
cobblemon.species.staravia.desc: They form remarkably large flocks and are constantly fighting amongst themselves. I suspect that those with magnificent plumes on their heads are the strong ones.
cobblemon.species.staraptor.name: Стараптор
cobblemon.species.staraptor.desc: It has left the flock, having gained strength enough to survive on its own. The astounding force with which Staraptor flies through the air allows it to carry away large, burly targets.
cobblemon.species.bidoof.name: Бідуф
cobblemon.species.bidoof.desc: Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.
cobblemon.species.bibarel.name: Бібарель
cobblemon.species.bibarel.desc: Bibarel fur repels water and is also a fantastic material for heat retention. These Pokémon create dams on rivers to live in.
cobblemon.species.kricketot.name: Крікетот
cobblemon.species.kricketot.desc: When the trees take on new hues, more of these Pokémon appear. The tone they create by striking their antennae together resembles that of the marimba, an instrument of foreign lands.
cobblemon.species.kricketune.name: Крікетюн
cobblemon.species.kricketune.desc: It uses its cutlass-like arms to produce sound, the melody of which varies from individual to individual. It is a worthwhile endeavor to seek out one's favorite tunes.
cobblemon.species.shinx.name: Шинкс
cobblemon.species.shinx.desc: Shakes its body to generate electricity. Its stature belies its aggression—one must be patient to tame this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.luxio.name: Луксіо
cobblemon.species.luxio.desc: Proudly uses its electrified claws as weapons. It seems to be a gracious Pokémon, evenly sharing the spoils of the hunt with others of its kind.
cobblemon.species.luxray.name: Лаксрей
cobblemon.species.luxray.desc: They form packs, each having one male as leader. Legends say that when Luxray's two eyes shimmer with gold, the Pokémon can see through anything.
cobblemon.species.budew.name: Бадью
cobblemon.species.budew.desc: When the sun's light strengthens, the bud atop this Pokémon's head opens. This is a sign to the people that the harsh winter is over, and the season of budding has begun.
cobblemon.species.roserade.name: Роузрейд
cobblemon.species.roserade.desc: Hidden within the bouquet on each hand are thorned whips loaded with virulent poison. Roserade moves gracefully as it corners its prey and mercilessly lashes them with its whips.
cobblemon.species.cranidos.name: Кранідос
cobblemon.species.cranidos.desc: An incredibly rare sight. They duel each other by ramming their heads together, and the resulting sound echoes throughout the area like the pealing of a bell.
cobblemon.species.rampardos.name: Рампардос
cobblemon.species.rampardos.desc: Very little is known about its biology. Can knock down massive trees by smashing its beautiful, pearl-like crown against them.
cobblemon.species.shieldon.name: Шилдон
cobblemon.species.shieldon.desc: Much remains unknown about this Pokémon, as few have ever seen it. However, we know that it is calm and dislikes conflict, and it enjoys polishing its face against trees and rocks.
cobblemon.species.bastiodon.name: Бастіодон
cobblemon.species.bastiodon.desc: Its face is sturdy—as strong as diamond—and this hardness offers a very stable defense. Much about this species is still unknown, such as its natural habitat.
cobblemon.species.burmy.name: Бормі
cobblemon.species.burmy.desc: If its cloak is even slightly damaged, Burmy will immediately repair it with whatever is close at hand. The Pokémon within the cloak is scrawny and vulnerable to the cold.
cobblemon.species.wormadam.name: Вормадам
cobblemon.species.wormadam.desc: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
cobblemon.species.mothim.name: Мотім
cobblemon.species.mothim.desc: Scatters steel-colored scales as it flaps its wings. Despite being observed feeding primarily on the nectar of flowers, Mothim is not often seen around flower gardens.
cobblemon.species.combee.name: Комбі
cobblemon.species.combee.desc: They swear fealty to a queen Pokémon and work diligently to gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.name: Веспіквін
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.desc: Commands its subjects to build its hive. It will dispatch any interlopers who dare sneak into its nest and use them as nourishment for itself.
cobblemon.species.pachirisu.name: Пачірісу
cobblemon.species.pachirisu.desc: A species related to the Pikachu line. Though Pachirisu is a calm Pokémon, it still presents a danger should one touch its electrified tail or cheeks.
cobblemon.species.buizel.name: Буйзель
cobblemon.species.buizel.desc: It moves freely in the water by spinning its forked tail for propulsion. The resemblance to the screw of a steamboat is coincidental.
cobblemon.species.floatzel.name: Флотзель
cobblemon.species.floatzel.desc: Has a long, rather splendid flotation sac, which prevents Floatzel from drowning even in stormy seas. One might glimpse this species around fishing hamlets from time to time.
cobblemon.species.cherubi.name: Черубі
cobblemon.species.cherubi.desc: Once the fruit growing alongside the main body is large and plump, Cherubi will use the nutrients within to evolve. The fruit then detaches, becoming nourishment for other creatures.
cobblemon.species.cherrim.name: Черрім
cobblemon.species.cherrim.desc: Motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of Pokémon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the scent exuded from Cherrim's folded petals.
cobblemon.species.shellos.name: Шеллос
cobblemon.species.shellos.desc: Found in abundance on seashores bordering warm waters. Shellos are unexpectedly friendly and will crawl toward any person they see. Take care not to get coated in mucus!
cobblemon.species.gastrodon.name: Гастродон
cobblemon.species.gastrodon.desc: Eats beach sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will inevitably ensue.
cobblemon.species.ambipom.name: Ембіпом
cobblemon.species.ambipom.desc: To affirm their kinship, members of this species will form a ring by linking their newly doubled tails together. On rare occasions, humans have been accepted into such rings.
cobblemon.species.drifloon.name: Дріфлун
cobblemon.species.drifloon.desc: Said to lure away young children and carry them off to the afterlife. Some whisper that Drifloon are formed of reincarnated human souls, but these rumors are as yet unconfirmed.
cobblemon.species.drifblim.name: Дріфблім
cobblemon.species.drifblim.desc: It drifts along at dusk, perfectly silent. Its transient, melancholy aspect touches some people deeply—every so often, one will come upon a song or poem devoted to Drifblim.
cobblemon.species.buneary.name: Банірі
cobblemon.species.buneary.desc: My hypothesis as to why Buneary rolls up its ears is that its hearing is far too keen. I surmise that the Pokémon protects its hearing by limiting the sound that may enter its ears.
cobblemon.species.lopunny.name: Лопанні
cobblemon.species.lopunny.desc: Its fur is warm and yet remarkably light. This Pokémon kicks as though it were a master of karate, driving back its opponents with ease.
cobblemon.species.mismagius.name: Місмагіус
cobblemon.species.mismagius.desc: The incantations Mismagius chants can ward against misfortune, so a custom exists of inviting it into one's home. Incur the Pokémon's displeasure, however, and disaster will surely ensue.
cobblemon.species.honchkrow.name: Гончкроу
cobblemon.species.honchkrow.desc: One cry from this Pokémon, and a murder of Murkrow come flying. At such times, one would think the curtain of night had fallen, plunging the world into jet-black darkness.
cobblemon.species.glameow.name: Ґлеймяу
cobblemon.species.glameow.desc: Bewitches humans with its helical tail and piercing gaze. Its hidden claws are quite sharp as well, making this Pokémon an exceedingly tricky opponent if antagonized.
cobblemon.species.purugly.name: Пураґлі
cobblemon.species.purugly.desc: Though impudent and difficult to tame, Purugly enjoys great popularity due to its fur, the beauty of which surpasses even velveteen.
cobblemon.species.chingling.name: Чінґлінґ
cobblemon.species.chingling.desc: This Pokémon gave me an excruciating headache when it seemingly cried out without making a sound. Perhaps there are some sounds that the human ear is simply incapable of hearing.
cobblemon.species.stunky.name: Станкі
cobblemon.species.stunky.desc: The poison that gushes from its aft end is accompanied by an utterly evil-smelling odor with such potency that one whiff can induce memory loss.
cobblemon.species.skuntank.name: Скантанк
cobblemon.species.skuntank.desc: Sprays a poisonous fluid to take down prey. Sometimes, unable to stomach the stench of its own fluid, it leaves the bested prey uneaten.
cobblemon.species.bronzor.name: Бронзор
cobblemon.species.bronzor.desc: Floats using a mysterious energy. The pattern engraved upon its back is held as sacred and can sometimes be found in imagery from ancient cemeteries and other such timeworn places.
cobblemon.species.bronzong.name: Бронзонг
cobblemon.species.bronzong.desc: Some believe that its bell-like cry opens holes to another world. It has been revered as a deity since ancient times.
cobblemon.species.bonsly.name: Бонслай
cobblemon.species.bonsly.desc: Its tears elicit sympathy from those who see them, but do not be deceived! This expulsion of body water is merely a physiological mechanism for keeping itself in good health.
cobblemon.species.mimejr.name: Майм Дж.
cobblemon.species.mimejr.desc: Known to turn up in bustling marketplaces now and again. It mimics people much as a child would, then watches how they react, eyes sparkling.
cobblemon.species.happiny.name: Геппіні
cobblemon.species.happiny.desc: In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.
cobblemon.species.chatot.name: Чатот
cobblemon.species.chatot.desc: A versatile performer skilled in the imitation of human speech. It is said that older, more experienced Chatot can even understand the meaning of the words they mimic.
cobblemon.species.spiritomb.name: Спірітомб
cobblemon.species.spiritomb.desc: It lays curses by thinking wicked thoughts. Writings tell that this Pokémon was born out of the assembly of five score and eight malevolent spirits.
cobblemon.species.gible.name: Ґібл
cobblemon.species.gible.desc: It nests in caves untouched by sunlight. Its sharp teeth may fall out when worn away or after an impact, but they regrow within a few days.
cobblemon.species.gabite.name: Ґабайт
cobblemon.species.gabite.desc: Though Gabite are usually of a violent disposition, when I gave one a glass bead it had been eyeing covetously, it suddenly became quite docile.
cobblemon.species.garchomp.name: Ґарчомп
cobblemon.species.garchomp.desc: Soars across the heavens at blinding speed—a magnificent sight! It has a feral disposition. Utmost caution is required if one meets a Garchomp out in the wilds.
cobblemon.species.munchlax.name: Манчлакс
cobblemon.species.munchlax.desc: Its robust stomach allows it to nonchalantly devour even rotted matter. It pays frequent visits to villages, seeking out food scraps intended for compost.
cobblemon.species.riolu.name: Ріолу
cobblemon.species.riolu.desc: Though infantile in appearance, it has the mysterious ability to read the minds of humans. The pure of heart are met with Riolu's approval, while those of ill nature earn only its loathing.
cobblemon.species.lucario.name: Лукаріо
cobblemon.species.lucario.desc: A most gallant-looking creature. It emits energy waves and controls them with precision, using them to sense even faraway beings. I have given the name ”aura” to this power.
cobblemon.species.hippopotas.name: Гіпопотас
cobblemon.species.hippopotas.desc: Though large and languid, Hippopotas is difficult to detect due to its tendency to burrow into and lurk beneath the soil. When agitated or excited, it expels sand from its nostrils.
cobblemon.species.hippowdon.name: Гіпоудон
cobblemon.species.hippowdon.desc: Short-tempered and easily moved to violence. It whips up whirlwinds of sand to crush its foes' spirits, then goes in for the attack.
cobblemon.species.skorupi.name: Скорупі
cobblemon.species.skorupi.desc: Its claws are not only razor-sharp but poisonous, making Skorupi a highly dangerous Pokémon. It seems to be weakened by cold temperatures, however.
cobblemon.species.drapion.name: Дрепіон
cobblemon.species.drapion.desc: Has a brutish, ferocious temperament. With immense strength and a sturdy shell off which swords will bounce, it rampages about and wreaks havoc.
cobblemon.species.croagunk.name: Кроґанк
cobblemon.species.croagunk.desc: A poison wielder with a dastardly personality. Despite such qualities, this species is afforded a measure of popularity due to its peculiar cry and comical features.
cobblemon.species.toxicroak.name: Токсикрок
cobblemon.species.toxicroak.desc: Its crimson claws contain a virulent toxin. This toxin can be made into a tonic by diluting it, mixing it with several types of wild grass, and boiling it down over two days.
cobblemon.species.carnivine.name: Карнівайн
cobblemon.species.carnivine.desc: Though this is a plant Pokémon, it has a gluttonous and unruly temperament. Carnivine attacks its prey with its cavernous maw wide open.
cobblemon.species.finneon.name: Фіннеон
cobblemon.species.finneon.desc: What a gorgeous sight this Pokémon is as it swims with its long, pink-painted caudal fins fluttering behind it. Finneon's beautiful appearance has led to its nickname: ”finery fish.”
cobblemon.species.lumineon.name: Люмінеон
cobblemon.species.lumineon.desc: Uses its gleaming fins to hunt its prey. The view of Lumineon schooling near the surface of the sea at night is breathtaking— it's as though there were shining stars right there.
cobblemon.species.mantyke.name: Ментайк
cobblemon.species.mantyke.desc: Though ball-like in shape, this Pokémon is a proficient swimmer. I have discovered that if a Mantyke spends much time with schools of Remoraid, it will eventually achieve evolution.
cobblemon.species.snover.name: Сновер
cobblemon.species.snover.desc: One is likely to encounter this Pokémon while out in the snow. There are stories of Snover appearing in human settlements but doing no harm—rather, they bond with the children.
cobblemon.species.abomasnow.name: Абомасноу
cobblemon.species.abomasnow.desc: A powerful Pokémon that can split huge boulders with ease. Dislikes associating with others and chooses to live quietly deep within the mountains, playing with the snow.
cobblemon.species.weavile.name: Вівайл
cobblemon.species.weavile.desc: This species corners prey as a pack, under the guidance of a leader. Weavile displays increased cunning, leading me to speculate that its evolution caused further brain development.
cobblemon.species.magnezone.name: Магнезон
cobblemon.species.magnezone.desc: I theorize that a special magnetic field influenced this Pokémon, changing its molecular structure and causing it to evolve. It emits strange radio waves toward space from its antenna.
cobblemon.species.lickilicky.name: Лікілікі
cobblemon.species.lickilicky.desc: Its tongue can extend and contract freely, and it is capable of reaching lengths over 10 times Lickilicky's height. Beware of the saliva, as it contains corrosive elements.
cobblemon.species.rhyperior.name: Райперіор
cobblemon.species.rhyperior.desc: This Pokémon evolved through use of a curious item. Its rocklike hide is composed of a mysterious substance and can withstand a blow from a masterwork sword with nary a scratch.
cobblemon.species.tangrowth.name: Тангроут
cobblemon.species.tangrowth.desc: Draped with long vines, it resembles a shrub in appearance. It swings bundles of vines as though they were arms, wrapping them around prey to ensnare them.
cobblemon.species.electivire.name: Електівайр
cobblemon.species.electivire.desc: Its evolution was induced by an unusual item, and its electrical output rises along with its heart rate. From its tails, it can unleash an electric current measuring 20,000 volts.
cobblemon.species.magmortar.name: Магмортар
cobblemon.species.magmortar.desc: Use of a strange item caused this Pokémon to evolve. Fireballs launched from the ends of its tubelike arms are hot enough to melt an iron pot in an instant.
cobblemon.species.togekiss.name: Тоджекіс
cobblemon.species.togekiss.desc: Scant few have ever sighted this Pokémon. After studying what literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when peace reigns in the land.
cobblemon.species.yanmega.name: Янмега
cobblemon.species.yanmega.desc: Extremely violent. When hunting, it wastes none of its energy, aiming only for prey's most vulnerable spots. Any who manage to tame this Pokémon must be of incredible bravery.
cobblemon.species.leafeon.name: Ліфеон
cobblemon.species.leafeon.desc: Cells similar to those of plants have been found in its fur. Its hard tail can fell a large tree with one stroke, and the tail's sharpness exceeds even that of a sword crafted by a master.
cobblemon.species.glaceon.name: Глейсеон
cobblemon.species.glaceon.desc: Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly. It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters like gems while it flutters and dances around.
cobblemon.species.gliscor.name: Ґліскор
cobblemon.species.gliscor.desc: It glides soundlessly on pitch-black wings and sinks sharp fangs into the throat of its prey. It takes on a look of satisfaction once it has entirely drained its prey of blood.
cobblemon.species.mamoswine.name: Мамосвайн
cobblemon.species.mamoswine.desc: This species reached its zenith during the period known as the ice age. I suspect that Hisui's frigid climate is in harmony with Mamoswine's constitution, thus awakening hidden potential.
cobblemon.species.porygonz.name: Поригон-Z
cobblemon.species.porygonz.desc: A curious item induced this evolution. The Pokémon's offensive capabilities have greatly increased, but the strangeness of its behavior has magnified in equal measure. This worries me.
cobblemon.species.gallade.name: Ґаллейд
cobblemon.species.gallade.desc: The blades extending from its elbows are sharper than the finest swords. Its swordsmanship, albeit self-taught, is astonishingly impressive.
cobblemon.species.probopass.name: Пробопас
cobblemon.species.probopass.desc: It is able to emit powerful magnetism, allowing it control over the iron sand that forms its luscious mustache. Using this iron sand, Probopass forms hard stones with which it smites its prey.
cobblemon.species.dusknoir.name: Даскнуар
cobblemon.species.dusknoir.desc: Comes to those whose lives have come to an end and escorts their souls to the afterlife. Known to mistakenly take the souls of those who yet have life left in them, albeit rarely.
cobblemon.species.froslass.name: Фрослас
cobblemon.species.froslass.desc: A Pokémon inhabited by the soul of a woman who died bearing a grudge in the snowy mountains. Legends of Froslass placing deathly curses on misbehaving men send shivers down my spine.
cobblemon.species.rotom.name: Ротом
cobblemon.species.rotom.desc: This bizarre Pokémon appears to be a will-o'-the-wisp powered by electricity. Be wary, as Rotom is both smart and mischievous.
cobblemon.species.uxie.name: Юксі
cobblemon.species.uxie.desc: A Pokémon feared but also respected for stealing away the memories of evildoers. I have found records that suggest Uxie holds dominion over knowledge.
cobblemon.species.mesprit.name: Меспріт
cobblemon.species.mesprit.desc: Known as the Being of Emotion. In legend, this Pokémon was feared, as any who showed disrespect would have their emotions thrown into disarray.
cobblemon.species.azelf.name: Азельф
cobblemon.species.azelf.desc: The dreaded Being of Willpower. Legends tell of this Pokémon manipulating the will of its adversaries and turning them into puppets of its own.
cobblemon.species.dialga.name: Дьялґа
cobblemon.species.dialga.desc: This Pokémon is revered as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth of Dialga was what caused the vast river of time to begin flowing in our world.
cobblemon.species.palkia.name: Палкія
cobblemon.species.palkia.desc: This Pokémon is feared as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth of Palkia was what caused the walls of our world to disappear, creating a sky that spans for infinity.
cobblemon.species.heatran.name: Гітран
cobblemon.species.heatran.desc: Stories tell of this Pokémon being birthed from the boiling magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds many mysteries.
cobblemon.species.regigigas.name: Реджигігас
cobblemon.species.regigigas.desc: According to legend, Regigigas pulled landmasses together and bound them with rope to create the continent of Hisui. Though I have my doubts, the story could well contain a shred of truth.
cobblemon.species.giratina.name: Ґіратіна
cobblemon.species.giratina.desc: There is one Hisuian verse that tells of a powerful light creating a deep shadow. I imagine that this deep shadow is Giratina.
cobblemon.species.cresselia.name: Креселія
cobblemon.species.cresselia.desc: Cresselia is reminiscent of the crescent moon. It leaves a brilliant line of light in its wake as it flies across the night sky. I daresay it resembles the heavenly maiden who created the Milky Way.
cobblemon.species.phione.name: Фіон
cobblemon.species.phione.desc: Can be seen floating offshore during seasons when the seas are warm. Its azure body blends in with the ocean waters—logic suggests this is a defense mechanism against natural predators.
cobblemon.species.manaphy.name: Манафі
cobblemon.species.manaphy.desc: Rumored to migrate across the oceans and visit Hisui's coastal waters only rarely. Although Manaphy resembles Phione, it is also quite different. The relation between the two is unclear.
cobblemon.species.darkrai.name: Даркрай
cobblemon.species.darkrai.desc: On a moonless night, a strange incident occurred in which every one of a village's inhabitants suffered nightmares. The villagers attested that Darkrai appeared before them in these nightmares.
cobblemon.species.shaymin.name: Шеймін
cobblemon.species.shaymin.desc: When the turning of seasons brings the cruel winter to its end and the joyous people give thanks to the heavens, Shaymin appears and covers the withered land with flowers.
cobblemon.species.arceus.name: Аркеус
cobblemon.species.arceus.desc: It is the heavenly fount from which pours the light that shines across Hisui. Its luminance guides and protects all Pokémon. Hisuian mythology states that Arceus is the creator of all things.
cobblemon.species.victini.name: Віктіні
cobblemon.species.victini.desc: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being’s entire body will be overflowing with power.
cobblemon.species.snivy.name: Снайві
cobblemon.species.snivy.desc: Фотосинтезує, купаючи свій хвіст в сонячних променях. Коли Снайві почувається погано, його хвіст звисає.
cobblemon.species.servine.name: Сервайн
cobblemon.species.servine.desc: When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.
cobblemon.species.serperior.name: Серперіор
cobblemon.species.serperior.desc: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.
cobblemon.species.tepig.name: Тепіг
cobblemon.species.tepig.desc: Він полюбляє смажені ягоди, але іноді надто захоплюється і спалює їх до хрусткої скоринки.
cobblemon.species.pignite.name: Пігнайт
cobblemon.species.pignite.desc: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
cobblemon.species.emboar.name: Ембор
cobblemon.species.emboar.desc: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.
cobblemon.species.oshawott.name: Ошавот
cobblemon.species.oshawott.desc: Цей Покемон із регіону Юнова використовує мушлю на своєму животі як зброю.
cobblemon.species.dewott.name: Дьювот
cobblemon.species.dewott.desc: Its exquisite double-scalchop technique is likely the result of daily training, and it can send even masters of the blade fleeing in defeat.
cobblemon.species.samurott.name: Самурот
cobblemon.species.samurott.desc: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
cobblemon.species.patrat.name: Патрат
cobblemon.species.patrat.desc: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.
cobblemon.species.watchog.name: Вачхог
cobblemon.species.watchog.desc: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.
cobblemon.species.lillipup.name: Ліліпап
cobblemon.species.lillipup.desc: This Pokémon is far brighter than the average child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it receives or any abuse it suffers.
cobblemon.species.herdier.name: Гердієр
cobblemon.species.herdier.desc: The black fur that covers this Pokémon’s body is dense and springy. Even sharp fangs bounce right off.
cobblemon.species.stoutland.name: Стаутленд
cobblemon.species.stoutland.desc: Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive moustache. It’s said that moustache length is what determines social standing among this species.
cobblemon.species.purrloin.name: Пурлоїн
cobblemon.species.purrloin.desc: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.
cobblemon.species.liepard.name: Лайпард
cobblemon.species.liepard.desc: This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey without making any sound at all. It competes with Thievul for territory.
cobblemon.species.pansage.name: Пансейдж
cobblemon.species.pansage.desc: It’s good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It’s kind enough to share them with friends.
cobblemon.species.simisage.name: Сімісейдж
cobblemon.species.simisage.desc: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
cobblemon.species.pansear.name: Пансір
cobblemon.species.pansear.desc: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.simisear.name: Сімісір
cobblemon.species.simisear.desc: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
cobblemon.species.panpour.name: Панпур
cobblemon.species.panpour.desc: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
cobblemon.species.simipour.name: Сіміпур
cobblemon.species.simipour.desc: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
cobblemon.species.munna.name: Муна
cobblemon.species.munna.desc: It eats dreams and releases mist. The mist is pink when it’s eating a good dream, and black when it’s eating a nightmare.
cobblemon.species.musharna.name: Машарна
cobblemon.species.musharna.desc: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.
cobblemon.species.pidove.name: Підов
cobblemon.species.pidove.desc: It’s forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.
cobblemon.species.tranquill.name: Транквіл
cobblemon.species.tranquill.desc: These bright Pokémon have acute memories. Apparently delivery workers often choose them as their partners.
cobblemon.species.unfezant.name: Анфезант
cobblemon.species.unfezant.desc: This Pokémon is intelligent and intensely proud. People will sit up and take notice if you become the Trainer of one.
cobblemon.species.blitzle.name: Блітзлі
cobblemon.species.blitzle.desc: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
cobblemon.species.zebstrika.name: Зебстріка
cobblemon.species.zebstrika.desc: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
cobblemon.species.roggenrola.name: Рогенрола
cobblemon.species.roggenrola.desc: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it makes this Pokémon slightly warm to the touch.
cobblemon.species.boldore.name: Болдор
cobblemon.species.boldore.desc: It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever changing the direction it’s facing.
cobblemon.species.gigalith.name: Гігаліт
cobblemon.species.gigalith.desc: Although its energy blasts can blow away a dump truck, they have a limitation— they can only be fired when the sun is out.
cobblemon.species.woobat.name: Вубат
cobblemon.species.woobat.desc: It emits ultrasonic waves as it flutters about, searching for its prey—bug Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.swoobat.name: Свубат
cobblemon.species.swoobat.desc: The auspicious shape of this Pokémon’s nose apparently led some regions to consider Swoobat a symbol of good luck.
cobblemon.species.drilbur.name: Дрілбур
cobblemon.species.drilbur.desc: It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.
cobblemon.species.excadrill.name: Екскадріл
cobblemon.species.excadrill.desc: Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.
cobblemon.species.audino.name: Аудіно
cobblemon.species.audino.desc: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’ feelings and physical conditions.
cobblemon.species.timburr.name: Тімбур
cobblemon.species.timburr.desc: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.
cobblemon.species.gurdurr.name: Гардур
cobblemon.species.gurdurr.desc: Gurdurr excels at demolition—construction is not its forte. In any case, there’s skill in the way this Pokémon wields its metal beam.
cobblemon.species.conkeldurr.name: Конкелдур
cobblemon.species.conkeldurr.desc: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.
cobblemon.species.tympole.name: Тимпол
cobblemon.species.tympole.desc: It uses sound waves to communicate with others of its kind. People and other Pokémon species can’t hear its cries of warning.
cobblemon.species.palpitoad.name: Палпітод
cobblemon.species.palpitoad.desc: On occasion, their cries are sublimely pleasing to the ear. Palpitoad with larger lumps on their bodies can sing with a wider range of sounds.
cobblemon.species.seismitoad.name: Сейсмітод
cobblemon.species.seismitoad.desc: This Pokémon is popular among the elderly, who say the vibrations of its lumps are great for massages.
cobblemon.species.throh.name: Троу
cobblemon.species.throh.desc: They train in groups of five. Any member that can’t keep up will discard its belt and leave the group.
cobblemon.species.sawk.name: Соук
cobblemon.species.sawk.desc: The karate chops of a Sawk that’s trained itself to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.
cobblemon.species.sewaddle.name: Севадл
cobblemon.species.sewaddle.desc: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
cobblemon.species.swadloon.name: Свадлун
cobblemon.species.swadloon.desc: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
cobblemon.species.leavanny.name: Лівані
cobblemon.species.leavanny.desc: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
cobblemon.species.venipede.name: Веніпед
cobblemon.species.venipede.desc: Its fangs are highly venomous. If this Pokémon finds prey it thinks it can eat, it leaps for them without any thought of how things might turn out.
cobblemon.species.whirlipede.name: Вірліпед
cobblemon.species.whirlipede.desc: Whirlipede protects itself with a sturdy shell and poisonous spikes while it stores up the energy it’ll need for evolution.
cobblemon.species.scolipede.name: Сколіпед
cobblemon.species.scolipede.desc: Scolipede engage in fierce territorial battles with Centiskorch. At the end of one of these battles, the victor makes a meal of the loser.
cobblemon.species.cottonee.name: Бавовні
cobblemon.species.cottonee.desc: Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s highly prized by many luxury brands.
cobblemon.species.whimsicott.name: Вімсікот
cobblemon.species.whimsicott.desc: As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.
cobblemon.species.petilil.name: Петіліл
cobblemon.species.petilil.desc: The leaves on its head are highly valued for medicinal purposes. Dry the leaves in the sun, boil them, and then drink the bitter decoction for remarkably effective relief from fatigue.
cobblemon.species.lilligant.name: Лілігант
cobblemon.species.lilligant.desc: I suspect that its well-developed legs are the result of a life spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.
cobblemon.species.basculin.name: Баскулін
cobblemon.species.basculin.desc: Though it differs from other Basculin in several respects, including demeanor—this one is gentle—I have categorized it as a regional form given the vast array of shared qualities.
cobblemon.species.sandile.name: Сендайл
cobblemon.species.sandile.desc: Sandile is small, but its legs and lower body are powerful. Pushing sand aside as it goes, Sandile moves through the desert as if it’s swimming.
cobblemon.species.krokorok.name: Крокорок
cobblemon.species.krokorok.desc: Although this Pokémon has specialized eyes that allow it to see in the dark, Krokorok won’t move much at night—the desert gets cold after sunset.
cobblemon.species.krookodile.name: Крукодайл
cobblemon.species.krookodile.desc: While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has the patience to stay hidden under sand for days, lying in wait for prey.
cobblemon.species.darumaka.name: Дарумака
cobblemon.species.darumaka.desc: This popular symbol of good fortune will never fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed or pulled.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan.name: Дарманітан
cobblemon.species.darmanitan.desc: This Pokémon’s power level rises along with the temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.maractus.name: Марактус
cobblemon.species.maractus.desc: Once each year, this Pokémon scatters its seeds. They’re jam-packed with nutrients, making them a precious food source out in the desert.
cobblemon.species.dwebble.name: Двебл
cobblemon.species.dwebble.desc: It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.
cobblemon.species.crustle.name: Крастл
cobblemon.species.crustle.desc: Its thick claws are its greatest weapons. They’re mighty enough to crack Rhyperior’s carapace.
cobblemon.species.scraggy.name: Скрегі
cobblemon.species.scraggy.desc: It protects itself with its durable skin. It’s thought that this Pokémon will evolve once its skin has completely stretched out.
cobblemon.species.scrafty.name: Скрафті
cobblemon.species.scrafty.desc: While mostly known for having the temperament of an aggressive ruffian, this Pokémon takes very good care of its family, friends, and territory.
cobblemon.species.sigilyph.name: Сігілиф
cobblemon.species.sigilyph.desc: A discovery was made in the desert where Sigilyph fly. The ruins of what may have been an ancient city were found beneath the sands.
cobblemon.species.yamask.name: Ямаск
cobblemon.species.yamask.desc: The spirit of a person from a bygone age became this Pokémon. It rambles through ruins, searching for someone who knows its face.
cobblemon.species.cofagrigus.name: Кофаґріґус
cobblemon.species.cofagrigus.desc: There are many depictions of Cofagrigus decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.
cobblemon.species.tirtouga.name: Тіртуга
cobblemon.species.tirtouga.desc: Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life from a fossil.
cobblemon.species.carracosta.name: Каракоста
cobblemon.species.carracosta.desc: This Pokémon emerges from the water in search of prey despite the fact that it moves more slowly on land.
cobblemon.species.archen.name: Архен
cobblemon.species.archen.desc: Archen is said to be the ancestor of bird Pokémon. It lived in treetops, eating berries and bug Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.archeops.name: Археопс
cobblemon.species.archeops.desc: Though capable of flight, Archeops was apparently better at hunting on the ground.
cobblemon.species.trubbish.name: Трубіш
cobblemon.species.trubbish.desc: This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.
cobblemon.species.garbodor.name: Ґарбодор
cobblemon.species.garbodor.desc: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.
cobblemon.species.zorua.name: Зоруа
cobblemon.species.zorua.desc: A once-departed soul, returned to life in Hisui. Derives power from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes on the forms of foes. In this way, Zorua vents lingering malice.
cobblemon.species.zoroark.name: Зороарк
cobblemon.species.zoroark.desc: With its disheveled white fur, it looks like an embodiment of death. Heedless of its own safety, Zoroark attacks its nemeses with a bitter energy so intense, it lacerates Zoroark's own body.
cobblemon.species.minccino.name: Мінчіно
cobblemon.species.minccino.desc: They pet each other with their tails as a form of greeting. Of the two, the one whose tail is fluffier is a bit more boastful.
cobblemon.species.cinccino.name: Чінчіно
cobblemon.species.cinccino.desc: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.
cobblemon.species.gothita.name: Готіта
cobblemon.species.gothita.desc: Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe it’s speaking to something only it can see.
cobblemon.species.gothorita.name: Готоріта
cobblemon.species.gothorita.desc: On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon’s psychic power is at its strongest. It’s unknown just what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.
cobblemon.species.gothitelle.name: Готітель
cobblemon.species.gothitelle.desc: A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle went missing that same day and was never seen again.
cobblemon.species.solosis.name: Солосіс
cobblemon.species.solosis.desc: Many say that the special liquid covering this Pokémon’s body would allow it to survive in the vacuum of space.
cobblemon.species.duosion.name: Дуожн
cobblemon.species.duosion.desc: Its brain has split into two, and the two halves rarely think alike. Its actions are utterly unpredictable.
cobblemon.species.reuniclus.name: Реюніклус
cobblemon.species.reuniclus.desc: It’s said that drinking the liquid surrounding Reuniclus grants wisdom. Problem is, the liquid is highly toxic to anything besides Reuniclus itself.
cobblemon.species.ducklett.name: Даклет
cobblemon.species.ducklett.desc: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
cobblemon.species.swanna.name: Сванна
cobblemon.species.swanna.desc: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
cobblemon.species.vanillite.name: Ванілайт
cobblemon.species.vanillite.desc: Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.
cobblemon.species.vanillish.name: Ваніліш
cobblemon.species.vanillish.desc: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.vanilluxe.name: Ванілюкс
cobblemon.species.vanilluxe.desc: People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.deerling.name: Дірлінґ
cobblemon.species.deerling.desc: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
cobblemon.species.sawsbuck.name: Соусбак
cobblemon.species.sawsbuck.desc: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
cobblemon.species.emolga.name: Емолґа
cobblemon.species.emolga.desc: This Pokémon absolutely loves sweet berries. Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much food that it can’t fly properly.
cobblemon.species.karrablast.name: Карабласт
cobblemon.species.karrablast.desc: It spits a liquid from its mouth to melt through Shelmet’s shell. Karrablast doesn’t eat the shell— it eats only the contents.
cobblemon.species.escavalier.name: Ескавальєр
cobblemon.species.escavalier.desc: It charges its enemies, lances at the ready. An image of one of its duels is captured in a famous painting of Escavalier clashing with Sirfetch’d.
cobblemon.species.foongus.name: Фунґус
cobblemon.species.foongus.desc: The spores released from this Pokémon’s hands are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried, the spores can be used as stomach medicine.
cobblemon.species.amoonguss.name: Амунґус
cobblemon.species.amoonguss.desc: Amoonguss generally doesn’t move much. It tends to stand still near Poké Balls that have been dropped on the ground.
cobblemon.species.frillish.name: Фріліш
cobblemon.species.frillish.desc: Legend has it that the residents of a sunken ancient city changed into these Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.jellicent.name: Желесент
cobblemon.species.jellicent.desc: Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky, schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.
cobblemon.species.alomomola.name: Аломомола
cobblemon.species.alomomola.desc: The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened condition is that any Pokémon coming after them may also attack Alomomola.
cobblemon.species.joltik.name: Жолтік
cobblemon.species.joltik.desc: Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out static electricity. They’re often found sticking to Yamper’s hindquarters.
cobblemon.species.galvantula.name: Ґалвантула
cobblemon.species.galvantula.desc: It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are not yet good at flying.
cobblemon.species.ferroseed.name: Феросід
cobblemon.species.ferroseed.desc: Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings. Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s spikes grow big and strong.
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.name: Фероторн
cobblemon.species.ferrothorn.desc: Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes on its feelers into the stone.
cobblemon.species.klink.name: Клінк
cobblemon.species.klink.desc: It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration behind ancient people’s invention of the first gears.
cobblemon.species.klang.name: Кланґ
cobblemon.species.klang.desc: Many companies in the Galar region choose Klang as their logo. This Pokémon is considered the symbol of industrial technology.
cobblemon.species.klinklang.name: Клінкланґ
cobblemon.species.klinklang.desc: The three gears that compose this Pokémon spin at high speed. Its new spiked gear isn’t a living creature.
cobblemon.species.tynamo.name: Тинамо
cobblemon.species.tynamo.desc: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
cobblemon.species.eelektrik.name: Ілектрік
cobblemon.species.eelektrik.desc: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
cobblemon.species.eelektross.name: Ілектрос
cobblemon.species.eelektross.desc: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
cobblemon.species.elgyem.name: Елґієм
cobblemon.species.elgyem.desc: This Pokémon was discovered about 50 years ago. Its highly developed brain enables it to exert its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.beheeyem.name: Бегієм
cobblemon.species.beheeyem.desc: Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields, this Pokémon can control the memories of its opponents.
cobblemon.species.litwick.name: Літвік
cobblemon.species.litwick.desc: The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs, the brighter and eerier the flame on its head burns.
cobblemon.species.lampent.name: Лампент
cobblemon.species.lampent.desc: It lurks in cities, pretending to be a lamp. Once it finds someone whose death is near, it will trail quietly after them.
cobblemon.species.chandelure.name: Шенделюр
cobblemon.species.chandelure.desc: In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of lights, funerals were a constant occurrence— or so it’s said.
cobblemon.species.axew.name: Екс'ю
cobblemon.species.axew.desc: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.
cobblemon.species.fraxure.name: Фракшур
cobblemon.species.fraxure.desc: Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents, stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.
cobblemon.species.haxorus.name: Гаксорус
cobblemon.species.haxorus.desc: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.
cobblemon.species.cubchoo.name: Кабчу
cobblemon.species.cubchoo.desc: It sniffles before performing a move, using its frosty snot to provide an icy element to any move that needs it.
cobblemon.species.beartic.name: Біртрік
cobblemon.species.beartic.desc: It swims energetically through frigid seas. When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater with its breath so it can rest on the ice.
cobblemon.species.cryogonal.name: Криогонал
cobblemon.species.cryogonal.desc: When the weather gets hot, these Pokémon turn into water vapor. Cryogonal are almost never seen during summer.
cobblemon.species.shelmet.name: Шелмет
cobblemon.species.shelmet.desc: It has a strange physiology that responds to electricity. When together with Karrablast, Shelmet evolves for some reason.
cobblemon.species.accelgor.name: Аксельґор
cobblemon.species.accelgor.desc: Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in bands of membrane.
cobblemon.species.stunfisk.name: Станфіск
cobblemon.species.stunfisk.desc: For some reason, this Pokémon smiles slightly when it emits a strong electric current from the yellow markings on its body.
cobblemon.species.mienfoo.name: М'єньфу
cobblemon.species.mienfoo.desc: Though small, Mienfoo’s temperament is fierce. Any creature that approaches Mienfoo carelessly will be greeted with a flurry of graceful attacks.
cobblemon.species.mienshao.name: М'єньшао
cobblemon.species.mienshao.desc: Delivered at blinding speeds, kicks from this Pokémon can shatter massive boulders into tiny pieces.
cobblemon.species.druddigon.name: Драдіґон
cobblemon.species.druddigon.desc: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.
cobblemon.species.golett.name: Ґолетт
cobblemon.species.golett.desc: This Pokémon was created from clay. It received orders from its master many thousands of years ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.
cobblemon.species.golurk.name: Ґолурк
cobblemon.species.golurk.desc: There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn’t been proven.
cobblemon.species.pawniard.name: Поньярд
cobblemon.species.pawniard.desc: A pack of these Pokémon forms to serve a Bisharp boss. Each Pawniard trains diligently, dreaming of one day taking the lead.
cobblemon.species.bisharp.name: Бішарп
cobblemon.species.bisharp.desc: Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and Fraxure over places where sharpening stones can be found.
cobblemon.species.bouffalant.name: Буфалант
cobblemon.species.bouffalant.desc: These Pokémon live in herds of about 20 individuals. Bouffalant that betray the herd will lose the hair on their heads for some reason.
cobblemon.species.rufflet.name: Рафлет
cobblemon.species.rufflet.desc: Its chick-like looks belie its hotheadedness. It challenges its parents at every opportunity, desperate to prove its strength.
cobblemon.species.braviary.name: Брейвіарі
cobblemon.species.braviary.desc: Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious bird Pokémon goes out on the hunt. It blasts lakes with shock waves, then scoops up any prey that float to the water's surface.
cobblemon.species.vullaby.name: Вулабай
cobblemon.species.vullaby.desc: Vullaby grow quickly. Bones that have gotten too small for older Vullaby to wear often get passed down to younger ones in the nest.
cobblemon.species.mandibuzz.name: Мандібазз
cobblemon.species.mandibuzz.desc: They adorn themselves with bones. There seem to be fashion trends among them, as different bones come into and fall out of popularity.
cobblemon.species.heatmor.name: Гітмор
cobblemon.species.heatmor.desc: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.
cobblemon.species.durant.name: Дюрант
cobblemon.species.durant.desc: With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can crunch their way through rock. They work together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.
cobblemon.species.deino.name: Дейно
cobblemon.species.deino.desc: Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly biting at everything it touches, trying to keep track of its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.zweilous.name: Звейлос
cobblemon.species.zweilous.desc: Their two heads will fight each other over a single piece of food. Zweilous are covered in scars even without battling others.
cobblemon.species.hydreigon.name: Гідрейгон
cobblemon.species.hydreigon.desc: The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their target goes down.
cobblemon.species.larvesta.name: Ларвеста
cobblemon.species.larvesta.desc: Larvesta’s body is warm all over. It spouts fire from the tips of its horns to intimidate predators and scare prey.
cobblemon.species.volcarona.name: Вулкарона
cobblemon.species.volcarona.desc: This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.
cobblemon.species.cobalion.name: Кобаліон
cobblemon.species.cobalion.desc: From the moment it’s born, this Pokémon radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will calm even vicious foes.
cobblemon.species.terrakion.name: Терракіон
cobblemon.species.terrakion.desc: In Unovan legend, Terrakion battled against humans in an effort to protect other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.virizion.name: Вірізіон
cobblemon.species.virizion.desc: It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick movements, slicing them up with its horns.
cobblemon.species.tornadus.name: Торнадус
cobblemon.species.tornadus.desc: This storm-stirring Pokémon is said to cause the seasons to turn by whipping up the air. I suspect its humanlike form to be a false one.
cobblemon.species.thundurus.name: Тандерус
cobblemon.species.thundurus.desc: They say this wielder of electricity has waged war with its nemesis, Tornadus, since time immemorial. The lightning bolts it hurls pierce the very earth and enrich the soil.
cobblemon.species.reshiram.name: Решірам
cobblemon.species.reshiram.desc: According to myth, if people ignore truth and let themselves become consumed by greed, Reshiram will arrive to burn their kingdoms down.
cobblemon.species.zekrom.name: Зекром
cobblemon.species.zekrom.desc: Mythology tells us that if people lose the righteousness in their hearts, their kingdoms will be razed by Zekrom’s lightning.
cobblemon.species.landorus.name: Лендорус
cobblemon.species.landorus.desc: When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.
cobblemon.species.kyurem.name: К'юрем
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc: It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.keldeo.name: Кельдео
cobblemon.species.keldeo.desc: They say that Keldeo must survive harsh battles and fully develop the horn on its forehead before this Pokémon’s true power will awaken.
cobblemon.species.meloetta.name: Мелоетта
cobblemon.species.meloetta.desc: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
cobblemon.species.genesect.name: Ґенесект
cobblemon.species.genesect.desc: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
cobblemon.species.chespin.name: Чеспін
cobblemon.species.chespin.desc: Настільки товстий дерев’яний панцир покриває його голову і спину, що навіть пряме зіштовхнення з вантажівкою його не збентежить.
cobblemon.species.quilladin.name: Квілладін
cobblemon.species.quilladin.desc: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won’t start fights.
cobblemon.species.chesnaught.name: Чеснафт
cobblemon.species.chesnaught.desc: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
cobblemon.species.fennekin.name: Феннекін
cobblemon.species.fennekin.desc: Під час прогулянки перекушує гілочками. Він залякує супротивників, дмучи з вух гарячим повітрям.
cobblemon.species.braixen.name: Брайксен
cobblemon.species.braixen.desc: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
cobblemon.species.delphox.name: Дельфокс
cobblemon.species.delphox.desc: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
cobblemon.species.froakie.name: Фрокі
cobblemon.species.froakie.desc: Він захищає свою шкіру, покриваючи своє тіло легкими бульбашками.
cobblemon.species.frogadier.name: Фроґадір
cobblemon.species.frogadier.desc: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.
cobblemon.species.greninja.name: Ґреніндзя
cobblemon.species.greninja.desc: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
cobblemon.species.bunnelby.name: Банелбі
cobblemon.species.bunnelby.desc: It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.
cobblemon.species.diggersby.name: Дігерсбі
